block.l: var get_ide = function () { var ancestor = this; var value; while (ancestor && !(ancestor instanceof IDE_Morph)) { ancestor = ancestor.parent; } if (ancestor) { return ancestor; } else { return world.children[0]; } }.bind(this); get_ide().saveProject(name);

var get_ide = function () { var ancestor = this; var value; while (ancestor && !(ancestor instanceof IDE_Morph)) { ancestor = ancestor.parent; } if (ancestor) { return ancestor; } else { return world.children[0]; } }.bind(this); get_ide().openProject(name);
